entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
